Entries.Rainy_day_1: Watch yourself, @, I've been known to toss mud.$1#$e#Forgive me, I'm feeling quite playful today.$1#$e#I love playing in the rain - it really makes me feel young again.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: When it rains, I find I can finally sleep soundly at night.#$e#It's simply relaxing, I suppose, the way the rain sounds against the roof of my home.#$e#Plus when it rains, I end up with a bed full of warm hens. The girls love sleeping next to me.$1
Entries.Saloon8: Hello, love, it's a good night for a drink, isn't it?$h#$e#It's lovely to see you. I always enjoy talking to you when I get the chance.$4
Entries.Saloon9: %He looks like he's in pain.#$b#No, it's fine, I just...$2#$b#Sometimes my missing arm - hurts?#$b#If that makes sense. Harvey said it's called phantom pain.$2#$e#It's very unsettling...$2
Entries.Saloon10: %His face is red. Looks like someone has been drinking too much.#$b#%Lyell looks at you. His stare is glassy and unfocused, but despite that he smiles at you.#$e#Hello, love, it's always a pleasure.$4
Entries.LyellsHouse8: Hello, darling, my home is your home.#$e#It's so much easier having you around.$4#$e#I get pretty lonely out here on my own, so it's nice to have a vistor.$4
Entries.LyellsHouse9: If you like, you can rest here. My bed is free.$1#$e#I know working on the farm can be tiring. I've done it myself on and off through the years.#$e#I grew up on a farm, you know. I know all about that lifestyle.$1
Entries.LyellsHouse10: %He looks deeply disturbed.#$b#I'm sorry, I...I keep smelling smoke, but I can't find anything burning.$2#$e#I'm trying to stay calm but it's difficult.#$b#I'm... admittedly terrified of fire now. Ever since the explosion I can only seem to handle campfires or the stove.$2#$e#Don't worry, I'll be okay, I'm sure.#$b#It always passes, after all.$1
Entries.Mon: It was a rough night last night...$2#$e#Oh I just - sometimes I can't sleep because my mind is racing by too quickly.$2#$e#It's nothing to worry about though, I can handle it.
Entries.Tue: %He makes eye contact with you but doesn't say anything.#$b#...Oh, it's nothing, I'm just thinking about something.$4#$e#%His blush grows darker before Lyell quickly looks away.#$e#I'm sorry, I can't get my thoughts in order. Let's talk later.$4
Entries.Wed: %Lyell looks embarrassed. His face is beet-red.#$b#Has... Has anyone ever told you that you have very lovely eyes?$4#$e#There's a old Gotoro saying...#$b#The eyes are windows into the divinity of the afterlife.#$b#I never thought much of it until, well...#$b#I met you.$4
Entries.Thu: When I was a boy, my father forbade me from cutting my hair.#$b#Everyone in my family had long beautiful hair. I'm thinking of growing my out again, but I'm not sure.#$e#Long hair is hard to take care of.#$b#I'd probably just pull it back into a ponytail.$1
Entries.Fri: Vincent is such a curious boy, always asking me questions about the war.#$b#I think maybe he wants to know because of his father.$2#$e#I always change the subject. War isn't something a child needs to hear about.#$b#The struggles of it, the pain it causes.#$b#It's better I keep it to myself.$2
Entries.Sat: %He smiles wearily at you. There's a pained look in his gaze.#$b#It's been years but I still think about my daughters Lyza and Lexi.#$b#I'm happy Lyza and her mother probably lived happily but...#$e#I still mourn the loss of Lexi and my second wife.#$b#Fire has taken so much from me.$2
Entries.Sun: It's a lovely day, isn't it? The sky is so blue and the sunshine feels amazing.$1#$e#%He's beaming with happiness.#$e#Life has gotten so much better recently, hasn't it?#$b#Even with the daily struggles, I can't complain much.$1
Entries.spring_23: If you go to the festival tomorrow, I will too. I love watching you dance.#$e#I still don't think I'll dance though. I've got very sore knees - I would hate to slow the event down.
Entries.spring_13: I think tomorrow I'll help color some of the eggs.#$e#It'd be a good chance to spend time with the kiddos. Those kids and their families are like my family now.$1
Entries.summer_Mon: %He looks like he's been drinking and you can smell beer on his breath.#$b#Don't look at me like that, I'm fine.$5#$e#I'm sorry...$2#$e#I shouldn't yell like that, there's no excuse for it.#$e#%He looks ashamed.
Entries.fall_1: %Lyell looks you over before breaking out into a deep blush.#$b#Oh I...$4#$b#I can't talk right now.#$e#%He avoid eye contact.
Entries.fall_Mon: %Lyell's mumbling. He seems to be deep in thought.#$b#Huh?$3#$e#Oh, it's nothing really.#$b#I was just thinking about something I read.$1
Entries.fall_Tue: %Lyell brushes dust from your shirt.#$b#There we go, you've gotten quite dirty from all that farm work.
Entries.fall_Wed: I swear, the longer I live here the more I notice Lewis's dirty ways.#$b#That man is up to no good, I'm sure of it.#$e#What man allows a company like Joja into his town?#$b#Unspeakable.$5
Entries.fall_Thu: One of my cows is pregnant. I'm waiting for her to give birth any day now.#$e#It's driving me nuts. I love baby animals.$1
Entries.fall_Fri: Fridays are usually good days, aren't they?$1#$b#Everyone's getting ready for the weekend and they're usually excited for the day to end.#$b#It's nice.$1
Entries.fall_Sat: Marnie caught me babytalking one of her cows today.$4#$b#I just couldn't help it, she was such a cute thing.#$e#I'm thinking of buying more land so I can expand my own farm.#$b#I don't have enough space for more animals.$1
Entries.fall_Sun: I've drunk too much coffee this morning.#$e#I'm serious, my heart feels like it's about to explode.$2#$e#I guess that's what I get, but you know, in a way I don't regret it. The coffee was good.$1
Entries.fall_15: We should go to the fair tomorrow. I'd love the company.#$e#Or, well, even if we don't go together, I'd love to see you there.#$b#I hope you come.$4
Entries.fall_26: Spirit's Eve used to mean something a lot more sinister. People were terrified of spirits and monsters, so they would offer food in hopes of satisfying their hunger.#$b#It's quite amazing it's become such a happy holiday.$1#$b#I guess life is just like that though. Things change so often.
Entries.winter_Mon: I know I shouldn't, but I've been talking to Pam more often.#$b#She's not a bad person, but she really needs to get her life together.#$e#If not for herself, then at least for her daughter. That sweet girl deserves a better mother.$2
Entries.winter_Tue: Would it be considered going too far if I wire up my animals' homes just so I can get them electric blankets?$3#$b#I'm fine with just my stove but I worry about my animals.$2
Entries.winter_Wed: Winter is such a hard season. Even though it's beautiful, I always feel pretty off the whole month.#$e#I guess it's the shorter days - I like the sunshine and it becomes night far too quickly now.$2
Entries.winter_Thu: %He sneezes and it's so loud it hurts your ears.#$b#Oh I'm sorry, I think I'm getting a cold.#$e#I'll have to buy some tea, it should help.
Entries.winter_Fri: I keep telling Vincent and Jas to stop playing around near the sewers, but they're two stubborn little kids.#$e#I'm worried something might be in there and they could get hurt.$2
Entries.winter_Sat: %He looks sad.#$b#I'm not feeling too talkative today, I'm sorry.$2
Entries.winter_Sun: I don't know about you, but I'm ready for winter to end.#$e#I miss the sunshine and planting seeds.#$e#I'm getting ready for spring though. Been stocking up on seeds.
Entries.winter_16: %Lyell looks upset.#$b#Oh, it's...#$b#Actually, I'm not doing so good today.#$b#I've got a lot on my mind. I know I shouldn't dwell on the past but it gets hard looking forward.#$e#It's best I not talk about it too much, I'll just upset you.$2
Entries.winter_17: %He looks weary.#$b#I just can't stop overthinking things lately.#$e#I can't help but feel like... if I had just watched my step better, I wouldn't have lost my arm.#$b#I know I need to move on but it's hard when you're reminded of it daily.
Entries.winter_18: %He sighs softly and rubs the back of his head.#$b#Life, am I right?$2#$b#One moment you're feeling great and the next you're being haunted by your past.#$b#Typical...
Entries.winter_19: %Lyell smiles softly, but his gaze looks sad.#$b#You're always checking on me, @, but who checks on you?#$b#You're very good to me and I'm grateful for that.#$b#I hope to know you for many years.$2
Entries.winter_20: I'm feeling much better today.#$e#The last few days I was in quite the funk but I think it's finally cleared up for now.#$e#Winter is nearly over - that's probably why my mood has improved.$1
Entries.winter_14: Will you be going to the night market?#$b#I'm going to try to, there's always a lot of neat things to buy.$1#$e#Last time I went, I stopped by the mermaid's show.#$b#She was beautiful and so was her singing.$1
Entries.winter_23: I hope to see you tomorrow at the Winter Star festival. I always enjoy your company.$1#$e#I'm terrible at buying presents for people though, I'm too practical and end up buying something they dislike.#$b#But in my defense, they can use whatever I buy them.$1
Entries.Mon10: I wouldn't go into the mines alone. It's dangerous.
Entries.Tue8: You just keep coming back. Thank you for that.$h
Entries.Tue10: Hello, love, it's always nice seeing you around.$h
Entries.Wed8: If you're not busy later, we should grab a beer together.$9
Entries.Wed10: I was just thinking of you... Oh, it's nothing bad.$s
Entries.Thu10: You look good today...#$b#Well, I mean, you look good everyday.*cringes*$s
Entries.Fri10: You've been on my mind a lot recently.$9
Entries.Sat8: *Lyell makes eye contact with you, but he doesn't approach.*#$b#*Oh, he's running off now.*$9
Entries.Sun8: I'm sorry, I don't have much to say to you.$8
Entries.Sun10: On Sundays I add gems and candles to my shrine.#$b#I'm not big on worship, but I like letting the gods know I think of them.$h
Entries.summer_Mon10: *He babbles incoherently*#$b#....Ah, I mean, it's a beautiful day isn't it?$9
Entries.summer_Wed10: You look hot...#$b#I mean, you're sweaty.*cringes*$9
Entries.summer_Sat8: *Lyell sees you and quickly walks away.*$9
Entries.summer_Sat10: Look I...#$b#I'm not very good with expressing myself.#$b#I hope that doesn't bother you.$s
Entries.fall_Mon8: Something keeps bothering my hens at night. I'm thinking of setting traps.
Entries.fall_Mon10: *Lyell looks tired.*#$b#Hm? Oh sorry, I didn't sleep well last night.$8
Entries.fall_Tue8: This is the date I was discharged from the military...#$b#Word of advice: stick to your farm.$s
Entries.fall_Tue10: *Lyell looks like he's in pain*#$b#...Sorry, I just - sometimes I can feel my arm hurting even though it's not there.$s
Entries.fall_Wed10: It would be nice to spend some time together... If you want to.$4
Entries.fall_Thu10: I never thought I'd get this close to someone again.$9
Entries.fall_Fri10: Something about fall takes me back.$h
Entries.winter_Mon8: Winter is such a great season. I love the snow.$h
Entries.winter_Tue10: I guess it's pretty cold. Your face is red.
Entries.winter_Wed10: *Lyell looks like he wants to say something.*$9
